name: Target Sight - Serviço
description: In Brazil there are two kinds of elevators. SOCIAL: dedicated to white rich people. SERVICE/Serviço: for the use of the black and poor work force, which lives in areas such as favelas. SocialxSevice = MetropolisxColony. We serve. Last week the Rio de Janeiro police killed more than 28 innocent people, in a cruel action at Jacarezinho favela. Metropolis attacking its colony. The elevators are broken, but the targets sights are not. Images and blood local footage overlapping. May, 2021. 1920x1920
